question: Who among the following is known for forming the “All India Muslim Women’s Conference”?
explanation: In 1916, the Begum of Bhopal (Kaikhusrau Jahan) formed the All India Muslim Women’s Conference. This conference passed some resolutions on reforms and educations. Abu Begum is known to have proposed a resolution against polygamy. Begum Mafida Ahamed was an MP from Assam in 1950s.
